title: RP to IP trading.
body:
Ok. So I have leftover rp that I can't spend... Perhaps something like 1 rp = 100 ip?
Or skin sales that take the price down to like 5 rp? (I have 5 rp from when I started) And WHY AM I THE ONLY PERSON ON THE BOARDS WHO ISN'T LVL 30??

replies.body:
63rp buys a 6300ip champ that sells for 975rp?
A+ math.
lol yeah 1 rp = 5 ip would be more feasible.

Yes that would be good but if it would be that way, people would just abuse it. Especially as most people are left with 100-300 RP after buying RP. The idea itself isn't bad but if it were 1RP - 100IP people would abuse the hell out of that seeing as you just need 10RP to get 1000IP. So that being you just have to get 100RP for 10000IP, which you can be using to buy runes and rune pages??(can't remember the price) champions and when they come out for IP chromas.
Don't worry ahah, you're not missing out on much. 5 RP is worth about 4.8 cents. Most people just keep it there and put it towards their next purchase.
